title: The thing people aren't realizing about Veigar's new Q
body:
I keep seeing people saying stuff like "Oh you can get twice the ap farm now" or "Oh they nerfed his ult because you'll wind up with more ap because you can get 2 minions!"

Last time I checked, they're not adding more minions to minion waves. With a  {{item:3165}}  I will get almost if not all the minions from a minion wave to begin with. The only thing you accomplish with the new Veig Q is pushing your lane and opening yourself up for more ganks which is now easier for the jungler because of the stun nerf. You don't some how wind up with more AP unless you're losing the game and you've got minions piling up at your base and you can kill 2 with one Q. But at that point it's so close to the game being over it doesn't matter anymore.

If his stun was such an issue why not change it 4 seasons ago when he was released. 

It's 4 years later and people are just now coming out of the wood-works opposing his E saying that it's problematic. The real issue here is that he counters mobile champions in a mobile heavy meta where not getting his is the name of the game. Turning his E into a skill shot just enforces this notion ontop of his E nerf and ontop of his R nerf.
